text:
[Verse]
Golden light in the sky
Day drifts into night
Colors fade goodbye
Stars begin to fly

[Verse 2]
City lights start to glow
Time moves nice and slow
Whispers in the wind
Nighttime just begins

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams come alive
Feel the spark let it thrive
In the night we'll survive
Sunset dreams high five

[Verse 3]
Echoes of the day
In twilight we sway
Shadows come and play
Take our cares away

[Verse 4]
Moonbeams shining bright
Fill the world with light
Hearts are feeling right
Dancing in the night

[Bridge]
Stars just kissing the sky
Dreams take wings and fly
Underneath the moon
Magic happens soon
title: Sunset Dreams
